Sense & Sensibility: The Films of Ang Lee
Lust, Caution

(2007) dir Ang Lee, w/ Tony Leung, Wei Tang, Joan Chen [157 min]
During WWII, a young actress becomes involved in a dangerous plot to assassinate a Chinese collaborator with the occupying Japanese forces. With a pivotal part of the scheme involving an affair with the handsome enemy, the tension in this lush, erotic thriller comes not just from wondering whether the plot will succeed, but also from whether the actress will be able to reclaim her true identity if it does.
